ygData.subject: Re: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/12/99 10:08:20 PM Pacific Daylight Time, kim@stormhaven.org writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/12/99 10:08:20 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
kim@... writes:

<< Hmm, I don't recall hill giants starting to /con anything but
yellow or red until I was level 35. Cyclopses were blue at 30
though (at least most of them). >>

And? :) I killed 4 hg's today realatively quickly (didnt time this one, was
too busy tryin not to die). And yes they were all red. As I said be
creative!! Bards are an extremely strong class is played right. Anyways,
think about it, if ya can't figure out how I do this, l'll let my secret out
:)

Renaldo Rallentando of the 31st string (woohoo goodbye hell level!)
